trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDZ012_02646_SEQ_00<tab>Hidden Hearth is searching for someone willing to do a spot of hard labor.
TEXT_STMBDZ012_02646_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the Thavnairian limestone to Bent Frond.
TEXT_STMBDZ012_02646_TODO_02<tab>Scatter the Thavnairian limestone at the designated locations.
TEXT_STMBDZ012_02646_HIDDENHEARTH_000_000<tab>Would you be up for doing some heavy lifting on my behalf? One of the wheels came clean off my cart the other day.
TEXT_STMBDZ012_02646_HIDDENHEARTH_000_001<tab>You'll find four sacks up in the storage area. Give them to my sister, Bent Frond. She works at Byron's Bread.

TEXT_STMBDZ012_02646_HIDDENHEARTH_000_002<tab>You'll find four sacks up in the storage area. Give them to my sister, Bent Frond. She works at Byron's Bread. Ask her about getting compensated for your work.
TEXT_STMBDZ012_02646_BENTFROND_000_011<tab>Ah, thank you. I had been wondering when Sister would get these to me.
TEXT_STMBDZ012_02646_BENTFROND_000_012<tab>I know you must be tired, but would you mind scattering these limestones around the fields here? I'll pay you extra for the work, of course.
TEXT_STMBDZ012_02646_BENTFROND_000_013<tab>Open up the sacks you brought here and scatter the limestone evenly all over the fields.
TEXT_STMBDZ012_02646_HIDDENHEARTH_000_020<tab>You have delivered the limestone to my sister? Fantastic. Make sure she doesn't forget to reward you for your work.
TEXT_STMBDZ012_02646_BENTFROND_000_014<tab>Open up the sacks you brought here and scatter the limestone evenly all over the fields.
TEXT_STMBDZ012_02646_BENTFROND_000_031<tab>Fine work. Here is your reward as promised.
TEXT_STMBDZ012_02646_BENTFROND_000_032<tab>Gyr Abania is not blessed with the most fertile of fields. Nothing would grow if we didn't spread fertilizer around from time to time like this.
TEXT_STMBDZ012_02646_BENTFROND_000_033<tab>Likewise, our village wouldn't exist if it were not for the quarry, but we cannot expect it to provide for us any longer.
